weekly_top_story.headline: European Union announces 90% carbon emissions reduction target by 2040 ahead of COP30 climate summit
weekly_top_story.summary: The EU set an ambitious target to slash carbon emissions by 90% by 2040, signaling a strong commitment to climate action with global implications for emissions standards and environmental policy.

stories.headline: Elon Musk set to become world’s first trillionaire as Tesla stock hits performance milestones
stories.summary: Elon Musk could soon become the world's first trillionaire after Tesla shareholders approved a stock package contingent on reaching ambitious company targets, reflecting significant innovation and market influence.

stories.headline: FAA announces mass flight cancellations across 40 U.S. airports amid government shutdown air traffic control cuts
stories.summary: The Federal Aviation Administration will cancel hundreds of flights to alleviate the strain caused by air traffic control staff cuts during the government shutdown, affecting travel plans nationwide.

stories.headline: French authorities respond to violent vehicle attack on Île d’Oléron, injuring nine
stories.summary: On the French Atlantic island of Île d’Oléron, a motorist deliberately rammed pedestrians and cyclists, injuring nine people and prompting increased security responses.
